title: Hotel Lamia
description: Kovac hates his vampire curse. His best friend, April, hates people. Together they run a supposedly haunted hotel in the French Quarter. April's mission is to find a life mate for Kovac, so she can spread her wings to leave him behind. Her dedication to the vampire who saved her from entombment keeps her from living her dreams. Kovac's refusal to curse the woman he loves with immortality poses a never-ending problem. Until Nicole walks through the doors of their hotel. She's a ticking time bomb with stage four cancer. Is she the one to fill the ache in Kovac's soul for an eternal companion? April's freedom is within her grasp, until Nicole's best friend, January, walks into the hotel. Tasked with babysitting the human male, April's dreams take an unexpected turn.
author: Tiffany  Ann
